english_example_sentence: We, as small children, would grow up in a peaceful village.
russian_example_sentence: Мы, маленькие дети, выросли бы в мирной деревне.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz küçük çocuklar, huzurlu bir köyde büyüyecektik.
